sentences.en: He's under a haystack, fast asleep.
sentences.cn: 他早在干草堆里睡着啦!
沧海一粟,我该如何找到!

sentences.en: It was like looking for a needle in a haystack.
It's like trying to find a needle in a haystack.
sentences.cn: 要想在这茫茫人海中寻找到真正的知己,犹如大海捞针. (不可以么)

sentences.en: Looking for them now is like fishing for a needle in a haystack!
sentences.cn: 这回要在庄稼地里搜捕,那不是海底捞针!

sentences.en: More than 230,000 people joined Facebook group Haystack to try and reunite camera and owner.
sentences.cn: 超过23万人加入Facebook上名为[大海捞针]的团体,试图让相机回到物主手上.

sentences.en: Reid: A needle would stand out in a haystack.
sentences.cn: 一根针在干草堆里会很突出的.

sentences.en: Some sparks from a passing train set the haystack on fire.
sentences.cn: 一列过往火车迸发出的一些火花点着了干草堆.

sentences.en: The escaped prisoners lay doggo in a haystack until the searchers had gone away.
sentences.cn: 越狱的囚犯们一直躲在干草堆里,直到搜寻者离去.

sentences.en: The fox burrowed several holes near the haystack.
sentences.cn: 那头狐狸在草堆附近挖了几个洞.

sentences.en: They got lost and ended up digging themselves into a haystack just to keep warm.
sentences.cn: 迷路的他们为了保持温暖,只好挤在乾草堆旁.

sentences.en: They got lost digging themselves into a haystack just to keep warm.
sentences.cn: 迷路的他们为了保持温暖,只好挤在干草堆旁.

sentences.en: To look for a needle in a haystack.
Trying to find this file is like a needle in a haystack!
sentences.cn: 想找这个档案就像大海捞针一样困难.

words.tran_cn: 干草机；制作干草的人；强力一击
乡巴佬；干草种子，干草屑

trans.tran_en: a large, firmly built pile of hay
